DOC.brief_summary: This is a substudy of "Generation 100". The investigators will follow the persons with atrial fibrillation to see if 3 years of interval or moderate exercise affects the burden of atrial fibrillation, symptoms, use of health services or echocardiographic findings.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of 3 Years of Exercise in Patients With Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Included in the "Generation 100 study" Atrial fibrillation diagnosis verified by ECG
